LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSmartSEO.Admin.SEOTemplate.Global.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If set the SmartSEO Template will be applied for all products, categories and manufacturers in your store. NOTE: You can override a global SmartSEO template by creating a non global SmartSEO template and mapping it to category or manufacturer.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSmartSEO.Admin.SEOTemplate.ManufacturerMapping.SaveBeforeEdit
